Author: khalifaone
Title: [ANN][ICO] DPLAY.GG eSports TOKEN SALE [LAST ROUND]
Body: Final Token Sale round DPLAY ICO DPLAY.GG ICO is about to end in few weeks. 20 %BONUS DPX and chance to participate at “Future of eSports ERA” is still available on https://dplay.gg.   We are happy to announce our LAST Token Sale Round!   DPX distributed: 14,102,800 DPX of 20,800,000 DPX Thank you to 1618 contributors   Next Steps: Launching eSports platform v2 Develop DPX Wallet Weekly bonus Tokens for buyers List DPX on Exchange    Launching eSports platform v2 The statistics of each player according to the games played The matchmaking algorithm (a level 2 player shall never meet a 5 level one) eSports championship for the disciplines in our platform The option to transfer players from one team to another with a payment option in DPX    Develop DPX Wallet All DPX holders will have option to hold all DPX Tokens in MyThereWallet or DPX WALLET will be available on Android and iOS as app.    Weekly bonus Tokens for users All registered accounts on DPLAY.GG will receive weekly bonuses in DPX.    List DPX on Exchange DPX need to be available on the exchange markets for monetize profits and earnings from eSports Torunaments. We are in discussion now with 5 exchanges platforms for introduce DPX on their exchange markets.  Will be 4 medium exchanges and one big exchange platform. Once the partnerships are established, their names will be announced on our blog.     We want to thank you to all contributors and players who support our project!  If you are ready to get on board of DPLAY.GG ICO participants, click here.     Don’t forget about our 100.000 DPX GIVEAWAY    Regards, DPLAY.GG ICO Team

Author: khalifaone
Title: [ANN][ICO] DPLAY.GG eSports TOKEN SALE [LAST ROUND]
Body: Welcome to DPLAY.GG eSports ICO  DPLAY.GG ICO | WHITEPAPER | ESPORTS | TELEGRAM CHANNEL | TWITTER   The impact of technology on the eSports industry is very important in this period. Many eSports communities try to revolutionize the international scene. However, they focus on a less profitable niche for them or partners, giving players a free “playground” to spend their free time.  DPLAY.GG intends to become the main focus of eSports competitions in the coming months, competitions where only the best winners can monetize their abilities in the games: Dota2, Counter-Strike Global Offensive, League of Legends and Players Unknown Battleground and more.  DPLAY has already made significant progress over the past 2 years in the eSports field by organizing a series of events attended by more than 6.000 players in the Beta stage.   ROADMAP  Beginning, September 2016 - COMPLETED Team selection Develop beta esports platform First Project Concepts  Launching D-PLAY eSports, First Half of 2017 - COMPLETED Create first events Dota 2 events – Online 15 Partnership with eMAG.ro New Team Recruits   Events Counting, Second Half of 2017 - COMPLETED Partnership with Asus ROG Romania Participate as Dota2 Streaming Team at ROG Masters Open Qualifier România DotA 2: 25 online & 1 offline (Partnership with eMAG, Asus ROG & Logitech G) CS:GO: 7 online & 1 offline (Partnership with eMAG, Asus ROG)  Start PRE ICO 1st Quarter 2018 - IN PROGRESS Start eSports Tournaments Update eSports Platform Find PRE ICO contributors  Start PRE SALE, 2nd Quarter 2018 50% of PRE ICO founds to Marketing Ads Update v2 eSports Platform eSports Tournaments Weekly bonus Tokens for contributors  Token Sale, 3rd Quarter 2018 Launching DPLAY Client (Windows & MacOSx) Develop DPLAY Wallet Weekly bonus Tokens for buyers List DPLAY Token on Exchange  LAUNCH OF THE EXCHANGE, 4th Quarter 2018 List DPX on Exchanges Token Value Growth eSports offline tournament 500.000DPXs Prize Integration Match Making System  Advertising, 1st Quarter 2019 Integration Advertising System Streaming Section Training and coaching Going Global  DPX DISTRIBUTION   DPX PRICE: 10.500 DPX = 1ETH  SOFT CAP: 2.500 ETH HARD CAP: 10.000 ETH TOTAL DPX: 40.000.000 TOTAL DPX FOR ICO: 20.800.000 ACCEPT: BTC & ETH   TIMELINE & BONUSES (%) PRE ICO  1st week      16 April - 22 Aprl              $0.04                30% PRE ICO  2nd week     23 April - 29 April             $0.05                25% PRE ICO  3rd week      30 April - 6 May               $0.06                20% PRE SALE 1st week      7 May - 13 May               $0.07                15% PRE SALE 2nd week    14 May - 20 May              $0.08                10% PRE SALE 3rd week     21 May - 27 May              $0.09                 5% PRE SALE 4th week     28 May - 4 June               $0.1                   3%   PRE ICO & PRE SALE         52%         20.800.000 DPX Team                               20%         8.000.000 DPX eSports events                 15%         6.000.000 DPX Advisers                           5%          2.000.000 DPX Bounty & Referals              5%          2.000.000 DPX Project ecosystem             3%          1.200.000 DPX TOTAL                           100%        40.000.000 DPX    DPLAY.GG ICO | WHITEPAPER | ESPORTS | TELEGRAM CHANNEL | TWITTER | FACEBOOK | BOUNTY TBD
